summary.span: 处理 XML 架构中的元素和特性名称，还可以选择验证 XML 架构。

span.span: Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表列出了调用方法的情形 ：The following list identifies situations in which the method is called: - 由 类在 从标识为 Web 服务的类中创建对象时使用。By the class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services. - 通过 Wsdl.exe 工具或 类，从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类。By the Wsdl.exe tool or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - 通过 Xsd.exe 工具，从在程序集中找到的类型生成 XML 架构。By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies. 使用前面所述的类或工具，而不是直接调用方法。Instead of calling the method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.
